overview:
Mr. Cleckner is responsible for leading the day-to-day operations of the company, on-going strategy and direction.

Prior to MRA, Mr. Cleckner held executive leadership positions across the healthcare and technology industry including SVP of Professional Services for Emdeon Business Services, the Global CIO for Deloitte & TouchÃ©â€™s audit practice and Executive Vice President for Standard & Poorâ€™s.

Mr. Cleckner has a law degree from the University of Tennessee and undergraduate degrees in both History and Political Science from Trevecca Nazarene University.
